name: Beach Day (ChocolateCookieBro)
description:
Try surviving on a day at the beach while avoiding a deep flood! Collect sand particles to build yourself higher, but don't go too high or you won't be able to breathe. Collect the peach and blue particles to lower the water.

main bg music: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6

collect sfx: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/coin/

game over sfx: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/lose/
